compareGameRecords

public static int compareGameRecords(comp102x.assignment.GameRecord gameRecordA,
                                     comp102x.assignment.GameRecord gameRecordB)
The method compares two game records

Parameters:
gameRecordA - first game record to compare
gameRecordB - second game record to compare
Returns:
zero if the two records are equal, less than zero if gameRecordA is less than gameRecordB, more than zero if gameRecordA is greater than gameRecordB

coordsToArray

public static int[] coordsToArray(java.lang.String coordString)
Converts a comma separated coordinate string into an integer array

Parameters:
coordString - contains the comma separated coordinate string, e.g. "1,3"
Returns:
an integer array with the coordinates, e.g. {1,3}

coordsToArray

public static int[][] coordsToArray(java.lang.String[] coordStrings)
Converts an array of string coordinates into a 2D int array of coordinates

Parameters:
coordStrings - contains the list of coordinate strings, e.g. {"1,3","2,2"}
Returns:
a 2D integer array with the coordinates, e.g. {{1,3},{2,3}}

                                                             double finalScale,
                                                             int initialX,
                                                             int finalX,
                                                             int initialY,
                                                             int finalY)
The method generates an intermediate football image for the shooting animation

Specified by:
generateIntermediateFootballImage in interface comp102x.assignment.GameLogic
Parameters:
depthImages - an array of football images of different depths
initialStep - represents the initial step of the shooting animation
currentStep - represents the current step of the shooting animation
finalStep - represents the final step of the shooting animation
initialScale - represents the initial scale of the football
finalScale - represents the final scale of the football
initalX - represents the initial x position of the football
finalX - represents the final x position of the football
initialY - represents the initial y position of the football
finalY - represents the final y position of the football
Returns:
the selected depth image

Parameters:

getPossibleJumps

public java.lang.String[] getPossibleJumps(comp102x.assignment.Goal[][] goals,
                                           java.lang.String[] theNeighbours)
Filters from possible neighbours those where a jump can be made

Parameters:
goals - a 2D array of Goal objects that represents the goals displayed on the main game screen
theNeighbours - the list of neighbouring goals return a string array with coordinates of possible jumps

public static boolean isCurrentRecordHigher(comp102x.assignment.GameRecord[] highScoreRecords,
                                            comp102x.assignment.GameRecord currentRecord)
The method checks if a current score is higher than the one in the high score table

Parameters:
highScoreRecords - represents the 1D array of the GameRecords of previous game plays
currentRecord - the current game record
Returns:
true if the current record is higher, false if the current record is lower or not on the list

isNameOnRecord

public static boolean isNameOnRecord(comp102x.assignment.GameRecord[] highScoreRecords,
                                     java.lang.String name)
The method checks if a name is already in the high score table

Parameters:
highScoreRecords - represents the 1D array of the GameRecords of previous game plays
name - the name of the current game player
Returns:
true if the name is on the records, false if the name is not on the records

Parameters:
highScoreRecords - represents the 1D array of the GameRecords of previous game plays
currentRecord - the current game record
Returns:
true if there is lower score, and false if there is not

swapGoals

public void swapGoals(comp102x.assignment.Goal[][] goals,
                      java.lang.String goalA,
                      java.lang.String goalB)
Swaps two goals in the goals matrix

Parameters:
goals - is a 2D array of Goal objects that represents the goals displayed on the main game screen
goalA - one of the goals to swap
goalB - the other of the goals to swap

updateGoalPositions

public void updateGoalPositions(comp102x.assignment.Goal[][] goals)
The method is called by the program periodically to update the positions of the goals. The value of the not-yet-hit goals is synchronised with heartBeat. Heartbeat is also used for not moving the same goal twice during the same heart beat.

Specified by:
updateGoalPositions in interface comp102x.assignment.GameLogic
Parameters:
goals - is a 2D array of Goal objects that represents the goals displayed on the main game screen

updateHighScoreRecords

public comp102x.assignment.GameRecord[] updateHighScoreRecords(comp102x.assignment.GameRecord[] highScoreRecords,
                                                               java.lang.String name,
                                                               int level,
                                                               int score)
The method compares the record of the current game play with those of previous game plays and update the highscore records.

Specified by:
updateHighScoreRecords in interface comp102x.assignment.GameLogic
Parameters:
highScoreRecords - represents the 1D array of the GameRecords of previous game plays
name - the name of the current game player
level - the level of the current game play
score - the score of the current game play
Returns:
a new GameRecord array with current score added if among the top ten

                                                            comp102x.assignment.GameRecord currentRecord)
The method updates the high score table record where the name is identical to the one in currentRecord

Parameters:
highScoreRecords - represents the 1D array of the GameRecords of previous game plays
currentRecord - the current game record
Returns:
the updated high score record array

                                                            int indexToReplace,

The method updates the high score table with currentRecord at indexToReplace

Parameters:
highScoreRecords - represents the 1D array of the GameRecords of previous game plays
indexToReplace - the index where the record will be replaced by currentRecord
currentRecord - the current game record
Returns:
the updated high score record array

Returns:
